instruction: Given a list of weapons and a character, generate a story with the character using one of the weapons in the list.
input:
Character: Larry
Weapons: mace, sword, bow and arrow
output: Larry had a legendary mace that only he could wield. The mace provided him with unparalleled power in battle, allowing him to crush his enemies easily. Larry brought it with him on every journey, and it quickly became a symbol of his courage and strength. With it, Larry had achieved many victories and saved countless lives. He always trusted his mace to lead the way, and to ensure justice was served.
